channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How Marketers Can Incorporate Text-To-Image Generative AI Tools
item.description: To understand how generative AI tools can be used by marketing teams, I connected with Praveen Krishnamurthy, who is conducting research on this topic

item.title: Trade War Jitters: Will The EU Enter The US-China EV Standoff?
item.description: The US recently imposed a hefty 100% tariff on Chinese-made EVs, a move intended to protect domestic automakers. Will the EU follow suit?

item.title: The challenge of N + 1
